name: fifty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 the number 50: forty-nine, fifty, fifty-one "How fast were they driving?" "They were doing fifty (miles an hour)."
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough never married, they lived together as husband and wife for fifty years.Although the film was made fifty years ago, it has lost none of its magic.This car does about fifty miles to the gallon.You should see her wardrobe - it's unbelievable - she's got about fifty pairs of shoes.There are about fifty calories in an apple.
